Action.description: The action taken on the connected app within a tenant.

ActionBy.description: The user who performed the action on the connected app.

ActionDate.description: The date that the action was taken.

AppName.description: The name of the connected app.

AuthorizedBy.description: The user who authorized the connected app to be installed.

AuthorizedDate.description: The date that the connected app was authorized for installation.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique within your org.

LastUsedDate.description: The last date that the connected app was used for authentication.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted.

MetricsType.description: The type of data being collected.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is being collected.

Publisher.description: Represents if the relevant tenant is the original publisher of the connected app for all connected tenants in the org.

Scope.description: The scope or scopes assigned to the connected app. A scope defines the type of protected resource that the connected app can access.

Tenant.description: The ID of the relevant tenant.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant that the connected app is connected to.

Version.description: The current version of the connected app.
